General.Name: Kumpulan Fima Bhd
General.Description: Kumpulan Fima Berhad, an investment holding company, engages in manufacturing, bulking, plantation, food, and other businesses in Malaysia, Indonesia, and Papua New Guinea. The Manufacturing segment produces and trades in travel documents, licenses, and other security and confidential documents. The Bulking segment provides bulk handling and storage of various types of liquid and semi-liquid products, as well as transportation and forwarding services. The Plantation segment engages in the production and processing of oil palm and palm kernel; pineapple cultivation; and cattle farming activities. The Food segment manufactures and distributes canned mackerel, canned tuna, and frozen tuna loins; and offers contract packing services of powdered beverages and condiments for third parties. The Others segment engages in investment holding, rental and management of commercial properties, and trading and property investment activities. The company provides engineering consultation and warehousing services; manufactures and trades in biodiesel and related products; and sells local fruits. Kumpulan Fima Berhad was incorporated in 1972 and is headquartered in Kuala Lumpur, Malaysia.
